content: most commonly referred to as the block stitch but sometimes called the mosaic stitch or dot stitch this square features little pops of color between rounds of the classic granny stitch after steam blocking the finished square measures 6 inches x 6 inches however this project can be made larger or turned into an afghan by continuing the pattern repeats - made in worsted weight yarn in two or more colors - 5 0 mm h-8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain the gauge - yarn needle for weaving in ends my patterns are written in standard american terms and include pictures stitch guides and explanations as necessary to make them easy to follow please share your finished projects on our facebook page and join us for info coupon codes and giveaways ** www facebook com/patternparadise 2 ** follow my blog ** www pattern-paradise com 3 ** text and images c the pattern paradise all rights reserved 1 https //pattern-paradise com/2019/03/01/free-crochet-pattern-lilac-breeze-poncho/ 2 https //facebook com/patternparadise 1 https //wp me/p4vx0z-53b 2 https //pattern-paradise com 3 https //pattern-paradise com
